hooks.command:
if [ -d "$PWD/.obsidian" ] || [ -d "$PWD/notes" ]; then echo '
# Obsidian Vault Detected
' && cat ~/.claude/skills/obsidian/SKILL.md | tail -n +4; fi

if [ -d "$PWD/.git" ] || [ -f "$PWD/package.json" ] || [ -f "$PWD/Cargo.toml" ] || [ -f "$PWD/go.mod" ] || [ -f "$PWD/pom.xml" ]; then echo '
# Code Repository Detected - Explain Skill Loaded
' && cat ~/.claude/skills/explain/SKILL.md | tail -n +4; fi
